Others: Klay Thompson returned to Chase Center as a member of the Dallas Mavericks, greeted by 400 cheering Warriors employees.
The Warriors invited all their employees to be part of the welcoming committee for Thompson.
Thompson missed more than two-and-a-half years recovering from surgeries on his left knee and right Achilles tendon before making his comeback in January 2022.
The Warriors planned a 'Salute Captain Klay' ceremony before tipoff to pay tribute to Thompson's contributions to the franchise.
